about_the_game:
Velo is a unique cycling game that combines the thrill of virtual cycling with an engaging story-driven experience. Unlike other cycling games, Velo is a single-player adventure that takes you on a journey through a beautifully crafted virtual world, filled with stunning scenery and compelling characters.

Using smart trainers connected via Bluetooth, players must pedal their way through the game's challenging terrain, unlocking new areas and missions as they progress through the game's story. With a variety of missions and quests to complete, players will be challenged both physically and mentally as they explore the game's world.

The story of Velo is immersive and captivating, with a cast of characters and a richly detailed world that will keep players engaged and motivated to keep pedaling. With each mission, players will uncover more of the game's story, unlocking new areas and discovering the secrets hidden within the game's world.

No schedules, no training plans, no workouts, no competitions, just the joy of riding through a beautiful world while delivering important packages to its inhabitants. Velo is the perfect game for anyone looking for a way to stay active that is so fun to play that it draws them back in.

So if you're ready for a cycling adventure like no other, it's time to start your journey through this exciting new world.
detailed_description:
⚠ Warning: exercise bike required ⚠

Velo requires a physical exercise bike connected via Bluetooth to play. This is a virtual cycling game and there is no way to play this game with keyboard, mouse, gamepad, or controller. You must have a smart trainer bicycle which supports sending power measurements via Bluetooth in order to play this game.
